vendor_name: The Xara Palace Relais and Chateaux
title: Malta: Five-Star Relais & Châteaux Luxury with Gourmet Inclusions
description: Brought to you by one of the world’s most luxurious hotel brands, experience five-star luxury at its finest staying at The Xara Palace Relais & Châteaux, Malta, the only hotel located inside the medieval walls of the city of Mdina.
